data.name: BlastZone 2 Model Pack: Extreme Quality Terrain
data.detailed_description:
This BlastZone 2 model pack includes extreme detail terrain for the Homeworld, Alien World, and Cave environments. These models have 32x the triangle count of the standard terrain included in the game, bringing it to about 2.1 million triangles per block of terrain. This vastly increases the minimum requirements and disk space needed to run the game with them applied.

Once downloaded, these models are applied to the game by starting up the Configuration Application and selecting "Extreme" for the "Terrain Detail" setting. This option cannot be changed in game.

*NOTE: The first time starting the game using Extreme quality terrain may take a long time. This is normal and subsequent game launches should be shorter.

data.short_description: This BlastZone 2 model pack includes extreme detail terrain for the Homeworld, Alien World, and Cave environments. These models have 32x the triangle count of the standard terrain included in the game, bringing it to about 2.1 million triangles per block of terrain.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 3.0ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 7850 or Geforce 570 or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL 1.1 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 32/64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 3.0ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 460 or Geforce 1050 or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL 1.1 compatible sound card
